item.stained-lenses.default_lens.desc: Made by ClearView Inc, dis lens offerz clear vision n'strictly not cosigned fur any unauthorized tweakin'
item.stained-lenses.marked_lens.desc: MaRkS sEeN mObS, mAkIn ThEm tAkE mOr DaMaGe FrUm dUh UsEr
item.stained-lenses.entity_lens.desc: Hai-5 mobs thru wals, showing da sneaky hoomans
item.stained-lenses.focal_lens.desc: Me boutta introduz teh nearest creaturch to teh powerz of teh vawwy shinin sun (i gotz bored)
item.stained-lenses.sulfur_sight_lens.de: See da world in eerie green hues, like viewed thru a creeper's eyez
Xperience reality warp in weird wayz, similar to an enderman's unsettling view
item.stained-lenses.silk_sight_lens.desc: Viewz multiple perspectives all at once, liek a spoder's many facets
tooltip.stained-lenses.zoom_wheel.desc: Zooms in an out fur exact viewing
tooltip.stained-lenses.distance_measurer: Shows da distance to da targeted block or thing
tooltip.stained-lenses.proximity_spotter: Points out nearby thingies within certain range
